name: Newton (itch)
description:
Sir Isaac Newton is in trouble!

After his success with the first apple, he's gone back for more... This time however the apples are not so helpful!

This game was developed by Nathan Glover for CGA JAM 2017. The theme this game was based off was Gravity

The source code for this project can be found here: https://github.com/t04glovern/...

Controls

JUMP - Space

MOVE - Arrow Keys / WASD
